name: XA Short Sleeve Tech Tee - Women's

features: Active comfort: With an active fit and minimal seams, this tee is really easy to wear
Lightweight performance: Made from recycled polyester, this 67g/m² fabric is extremely light yet resistant
Versatile wear: This quick-drying tee adapts to all your outdoor activities
Active fit: On tops and bottoms, Active fit is close fitting and lets you move. Not too tight, not too loose
AdvancedSkin ActiveDry: AdvancedSkin technical fabrics improve body comfort by keeping you dry, warm and protected when you need it and where you need it
